name: Wendell LONG, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Long v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Wendell LONG, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of June, 2014, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John Jason Talaber, PA Board of Probation & Parole, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
93 A.3d 817
Wendell LONG, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 16, 2014.
Wendell Long, pro se.
John Jason Talaber, PA Board of Probation & Parole, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
